summary: AN ORDINANCE adding new sections 11.16.315, 11.14.782, 11.72.356 and 11.28.010 and amending Sections 21.16.120 and 21.16.300, of the City Traffic Code (Ordinance 108200) to authorize establishment of restricted parking zones with special parking privileges for vehicles owned, used, or serving nearby residents, and providing for implementing regulations, procedures and the enforcement of parking restrictions.
